biotools.summary: CRISPRCasStack is a toolkit capable of accurately identifying Cas proteins and comprehensively predicting CRISPR-Cas-related components, with the goal of accurately identifying potential Cas proteins that cannot currently be identified based on homology through a machine learning-based approach.

bioschemas.name: CRISPRCasStack
